transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haanji. Aap IndiaMART se baat kar rahi ho IndiaMART se?
Customer: Haan haan bataiye.
Executive: Haan bataiye. Awaaz nahi aa rahi aapki. Hello. Haan bataiye. Haanji. Bataiye sir kya problem thi sir ki aapne ticket raise kiya, sir ticket raise kiya.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haanji. Bataiye sir kya problem face kar rahe hain?
Customer: Madam abhi dikha hi nahi raha mere paas matlab.
Executive: Sir aap ye to dekhiye sir aapko aisa to nahi hai ki aapko buyleads kam lag raha hai ya fir aapki notification mein koi problem hua tha to maine aapko guide kiya tha ki sir aap in active zone matlab like kuch din se aapne IndiaMART buyleads inquiries vagera dekha nahi hai. Gap ho gaya hai jiski wajah se inquiries ka flow kam ho gaya hai. Hai na? Awaaz aa rahi hai meri aapko?
Customer: Okay okay. Regular to ho raha hai.
Executive: Haan kal kal bhi aisa hua.
Customer: Gap to hua hai madam. Diwali Diwali ko leke Diwali jo festivals the waha wo sab leke aap kuch gap to hua hai na uska uses mein.
Executive: Haan wo to Diwali mein madam aap jante hain ki chutti hoga to.
Executive: To wo inquiries kam aati hai to aap ticket raise kar dete ho. Aise thodi hota hai to hum log proper kaam karte hain aapke. Thik hai? Baki buyleads vagera bhi hai sir aisa nahi hai ki nahi hai. Wo to aapko dekhna padega active rehna padega na sir buyleads ke liye inquiries vagera bhi. Aisa kuch nahi hai. Check kar rahi hu. Abhi maine aapke liye inquiries check kiya. 3 November aapki aayi hai sir inquiries. Baki aapki aayi hai sir 6 November se aayi hai. Hai na? Ye dekho 4 November ko ek call aayi tha aapko buyleads call thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir aapko aa hi rahi hai.
Customer: Madam ek aad din mein ek ek aayenge to fir kaha se baat ho payenge bataiye.
Executive: Lekin abhi main bol raha har din agar ek ek hi mil payenge to kaise baat ho payegi?
Executive: Sir dekhiye aapka jo IndiaMART pe jo package chal raha hai wo product ke hisab se wo basic package chal raha hai. Thik hai? To isme to apna inquiries jo aa rahi hai wo aapke liye to sahi hai sir do teen din ki inquiries aa rahi hai. Wo to thik hai na aap jitna jyada follow karoge utna jyada badhega bhi aapka inquiries aisa nahi hai ki kam hoga.
Customer: Achanak se kam ho gaya.
Executive: Aap pehle se calls pehle aapke 8, 9, 10 call aate the. August mein aapke 74 calls the aur September mein 12 se 15 calls the. Aur isme aapke 24 calls mein so gaya tha. Ye October mein thoda kam aaya. Guys calls to thik aa rahe hain aapko.
Customer: Thik hai. Wo bhi ek do din se bilkul problem ho raha hai.
Customer: Maine ek kiya tha lekin mujhe dikha hi nahi.
Executive: Rating increase bhi ek baar dekh lena customer se rating increase jyada mangna ho sake sir to customer traffic ke liye. Thik hai inquiries vagera ke liye aur lead manager se inquiries vagera follow kiya karo waha se jitna jyada follow karoge utna jyada inquiries badhegi waha se customer ko reply kiya karo. Thik hai? Aur buyleads ki connection bhi sir kaafi kam ho gayi hai. Pichle ek mahine se sir teen hafta aap active ho. Thik hai? To koshish karo ki apne portal pe jyada active rahe buyleads jyada.
Customer: Usse kaam kya honge utne hi to matlab.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Nahi buyleads to buyleads to aa rahi hai na kaam ke?
Customer: Buyleads aa rahi hai madam aa rahi hai.
Executive: Aap try karo buyleads buy karo active raho jyada portal pe. Waha se inquiries vagera aayengi sir aisa nahi hai nahi aayengi. To apni ban jayegi do teen din wait karoge na ekdam buyleads ko bhi buy karoge aap daily apne buyleads pe bhi active raho inquiries pe bhi active raho apni inquiries aane lagengi. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai madam thik hai.
Executive: Main ye concern close kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states buyleads are not visible.

- Customer says getting only one buylead per day.

- Customer says buyleads have decreased suddenly.



Resolution:

- Executive says customer is in inactive zone.

- Executive says gap due to Diwali festival.

- Executive says customer needs to be more active.

- Executive suggests buying buyleads and being active.



Next Steps: 

- Executive closed the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, active, diwali, portal
